Bases: object

Store the job name of job(ai_flow.workflow.job.Job) in the current context.

Return the job name of the current job.

ai_flow.context.project_context module¶

class ai_flow.context.project_context.ProjectContext[source]¶

Bases: ai_flow.util.json_utils.Jsonable

ProjectContext maintains the directory structure and information of an ai flow project. A common ai flow project would follow the directory structure as bellow.

SimpleProject
|- workflows # Directory for storing workflow definitions

|- workflow_name1 # Is a directory store workflow named workflow_name1. |- workflow_name2 # Is a directory store workflow named workflow_name2. |- workflow_name3 # Is a directory store workflow named workflow_name3.

|- workflow_name3.py # Workflow defined file. |- workflow_name3.yaml # Workflow configuration file.

|- dependencies # Resource storage directory on which workflow execution depends.

|-python # Python file resource storage directory on which workflow execution depends. |-jar # Jar resource storage directory on which workflow execution depends. |-go # Go resource storage directory on which workflow execution depends.

|- generated # The File storage directory generated in the process of translator generating workflow. |- resources # Store the resource files of the project. └─ project.yaml # The project configuration file.

ai_flow.context.project_context.build_project_context(project_path: str) → ai_flow.context.project_context.ProjectContext[source]¶

Load a project context for a given project path. :param project_path: the path of a ai flow project. :return: a ProjectContext object that contains the structure information of this project.
